subject: Sentences (Criminal)
Heroin
Drug Abuse and Traffic
Olympic Games
Track and Field
lead_paragraph: Once dubbed the world’s fastest man, Tim Montgomery, the former Olympic track star, was sentenced Friday to five years in prison for dealing heroin to an informant.
snippet: Once dubbed the world’s fastest man, Tim Montgomery, the former Olympic track star, was sentenced Friday to five years in prison for dealing heroin to an informant.
